message: These are the people who are always talking about playing the race card.,,yet,, they play their race card all the time..speak English...these idiots believe that a Trump win invigorates their hate..no wonder they were so fearful of Obama as President...

""""The general population of Iran like USA."""" No one is talking about """"the general population of Iran"""". We're talking about ISIS, Islam, and its leaders. Yes, the people in Iran are NOT arabs, neither are the Muslims in Indonesia, so what's your point? By the way, you don't know me, and you don't know what I know.

Why are so many here comparing themselves to children? A delayed school opening and calling in late to your job are two completely different things. A child is not going to be destined to a lazy life cause of a delayed opening. Calling a kid weak and lazy is pretty low if you ask me. I dont thing you look tough trying to one up a child. Grow up and worry about your own life. And we dont need to keep hearing about how you walked up hill both ways in a blizzard every day when you were in school.

You've given me a great laugh for the day! Where do you get your """"facts"""" from about all the """"illegals voting in California"""" and the """"free driver licenses""""? You and the rest of the Trumpsters are just what your lord and master said he really likes: Remember when Trump said """"I LOVE the UNEDUCATED!""""
